```{python}
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
```

```{python}
#cargo datos

tarea_II = pd.read_excel(r"C:\Users\danim\OneDrive\Desktop\AVD\IIIC\Nayib\S-10\Superstore.xlsx")
```

```{python}
tarea_II.dtypes
```


```{python}
#Categorico
sns.set_theme(style="whitegrid")

ff, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(6.5, 6.5))
sns.despine(f, left=True, bottom=True)
sns.scatterplot(x="Sales", y="Profit",
                palette="ch:r=-.2,d=.3_r",
                sizes=(1, 8), linewidth=0,
                data=tarea_II, ax=ax)
```


```{python}
#Relacional
sns.set_style(style="ticks",rc={'axes.titlesize':10,'axes.label':10})

sns.lmplot(
    data=tarea_II, x="Sales", y="Quantity", scatter_kws={"s":20,'alpha':1})
```


``` {python}
#Distribución
sns.displot(data=tarea_II,x='Quantity')
plt.title('Grafico de distibucion Quantity')
```
